name: QuestionnaireCCARSDepressiveIssuesRating
title: Questionnaire CCARS Depressive Issues Rating
description: Extent to which a person experiences depressive symptoms such as, but not limited to, sadness, worrying, irritability and agitation.

concept.display: No disruption of daily activities. Issues are temporary, appropriate and do not impact functioning
May persist beyond situational events, but is not debilitating
Persistent, low-level or occasionally moderate, impacts daily functioning
Persistent and incapacitating, affecting most aspects of daily functioning
Person is completely incapacitated by and is seemingly incapable of responding appropriately. Impaired functioning and requires immediate treatment
